meanings.definition: Suffering severe mental or physical pain.
meanings.sent1: The anguishes cries of the injured animal could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent2: The patient's anguishes expression revealed the extent of their pain.
meanings.sent3: The anguishes look on his face when he saw the bill was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The anguishes journey through the storm of life tested her strength.
meanings.sent5: The anguishes sensation in his chest made him gasp for air.

meanings.sent1: Her anguishes heart longed for the return of her lost love.
meanings.sent2: The anguishes memories of the past haunted him at night.
meanings.sent3: The anguishes feeling of forgetting her keys again made her chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The anguishes weight of his responsibilities pressed down on him heavily.
